rooms.description: A welcoming space with a foyer that connects to the living areas, designed in accordance with Vastu by aligning doorways for positive energy flow.
Modern design featuring an integrated kitchen and living space with ample natural light. The layout prioritizes energy flow by placing the entrance on the east side according to Vastu principles.
A quiet, well-lit study area positioned in the northeast corner of the penthouse to enhance knowledge and positivity, following Vastu guidelines.
A spacious master bedroom with an attached ensuite bathroom, designed for maximum privacy and comfort while aligning room orientation as per Vastu norms.
A cozy guest bedroom ensuring a restful sleep environment, situated in the west section of the level to balance energy.
The ensuite bathroom attached to the master bedroom, designed for privacy and convenience in accordance with standard design norms.
